editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A91922 of text R182770 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing R1784). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 12 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 1 1-bit group-IV TIFF page image.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

ns0:epHeader.ns0:title: Cherubims. Cherubims. When man first transgressed and was driven out from God, God placed Cherubims, and a flaming sword, to keep the way of the tree
ns0:epHeader.ns0:author: Rofe, George
ns0:epHeader.ns0:defectRangePerGrade: The rate of 61.73 defects per 10,000 words puts this text in the D category of texts with between 35 and 100 defects per 10,000 words.
